entities.name: trapdoor
entities.description: The trapdoor is mentioned as a passage or entrance to another room.

entities.name: room
entities.description: The room is described as being full of small birds and having a heavy wooden door on the opposite side.

entities.name: birds
entities.description: The birds are described as being small, jewel-bright, and fluttering around the room.

entities.name: door
entities.description: The door is mentioned as being heavy and wooden, with a handle that can be pulled.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the characters who is trying to cross the room.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is another character who is trying to cross the room.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a third character who is trying to cross the room and help her friends.

relationships.description: Ron and Harry are accompanying each other as they try to cross the room.
Hermione is helping Ron by trying her Alohomora Charm on the door.
Harry is interacting with the door by pulling its handle.
Hermione is trying to open the door using her Alohomora Charm.
